item.title: Survey finds 51% of college presidents alarmed by Trump's return
item.description: A little over half of college presidents responding to an annual survey fear that President Trump's second administration will hurt higher education.

item.title: Federal judge pauses Trump's federal worker buyout plan
item.description: A federal judge in Boston on Thursday temporarily halted the Trump administration's mass buyout plan for federal workers.

item.title: ICE hits limit on detention beds, releases migrants
item.description: Homeland Security's deportation agency has bumped up against its detention bed space limit and has begun to release illegal immigrants.

item.title: Trump administration probes Penn, San Jose State over transgender athletes
item.description: The Education Department launched investigations Thursday into three institutions where biological males who identify as female have played female spo...

item.title: Democrats end boycott of Minnesota House after agreeing power-sharing deal with GOP
item.description: Minnesota House Democrats returned to the state Capitol on Thursday after reaching a power-sharing agreement with Republicans, ending a stalemate that...
